pkgmetadata.longdescription: Palantir's 'Blueprint' for 'Shiny' Apps // Easily use 'Blueprint', the popular 'React' library from Palantir, in your 'Shiny' app. 'Blueprint' provides a rich set of UI components for creating visually appealing applications and is optimized for building complex, data-dense web interfaces. This package provides most components from the underlying library, as well as special wrappers for some components to make it easy to use them in 'R' without writing 'JavaScript' code.
